descHeading: Publish your company services inside the Catena-X marketplace
descMessage: Register your service and metdata to get published on the marketplace. Scrolling down, you can find a quick overview of the service release process.
startCreatingButton: Start to register your service offering
stepHeading: The process will guide your through the following steps:
dividerText: Lets get started to publishing your service...

step1.headerDescription: The following input fields and uploads are used to create your service 'Service Card' which will be placed inside the marketplace. The service card is the first touchpoint with the customer. While entering the data below, have a look at the service card on the left side which is getting autoupdated based on your input.
step1.defaultCardShortDescriptionEN: [short description EN] this section will get replaced with your service short description

step2.headerDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .
step2.pleaseEnterValidHomePageURL: Please enter a valid url - eg: https://catena-x.net
step2.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid Customer Contact E-Mail

step3.headerDescription: To publish your service on the marketplace, a number of Catena-X specific agreements need to get signed by you. Please have a look at the mentioned agreements and agree to them via the checklist approval.

step4.headerDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard

serviceReleaseForm.OnlyOneFileAllowed: Only one file for upload allowed

error.title: Submission was not successful.
error.message: Please try it again or come back later.

submit.headerTitle: Thank you for submitting the service!
submit.headerDescription: After a review by a Catena-X administrator, you will receive

serviceoverview.headerTitle: Service Overview - Own managed service offers

serviceSubscription.headline: Service Subscription
serviceSubscription.description: Do you wan't to rather use the autosetup; connect your service to automate marketplace subscription build
serviceSubscription.search: ...search by entering the service name here.
serviceSubscription.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

register.heading: Autosetup URL
register.message: Enter your autosetup url in the input field below to store the autosetup endpoint. The endpoint will get triggered by CX as soon as a interested company is hitting the 'Subscribe' button in the marketplace.
register.providerErrorMessage: Something went wrong! Please try it later again.

activation.heading: Activate Service Subscription
activation.description: Activate the service subscription request of the customer by adding your customer specific service endpoint/url in the input field below. We will use the url to register/activate the service authentication with the CX idp. Additionally you will receive a technical user which can get used to connect the service tenant/connector to the centryl CX components/services (where needed).
activation.successDescription: The technical user has been created with the following data:
